description: "A hand-drawn map designed to aid navigation around the southern coast of Luzon and the islands of the central Philippines. It features side views of coastal hills and mountains (‘elevations’) to use as landmarks, as well as towns, shoals and reefs."
title: "An Spherical Chart of a part of the Archipelago of the Phill.ne Islands out from the Bay of Manilla to the Strait of St. Bern.no made by Lieut... Manuel Martines Camacho in the year 1804. [In MS with drawing of ships] [cartographic material]."
